CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 11, 1950, pg. 5, reads: "HARPER FUNERAL - Mrs. Elizabeth Harper, wife of Walt Harper, bandleader, was buried from the Wesley Center AME Zion Church last Thursday afternoon. She was killed in an auto accident last week while en route to Cleveland with five other people, who were also injured in crash.  Car was driven by Gerald Horsley, Pittsburgh sportsman.  Mrs. Harper's relatives are shown leaving the funeral services with Mortician Thomas West. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Men, including mortician Thomas West, leading women out of Wesley Center AME Zion Church for funeral of Elizabeth Harper, wife of Walt Harper
